product_name: Merrell Luxe Slide Sandals - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Dive into your daily life in the Merrell Luxe Slide Sandals. They blend comfort and style to keep your feet happy on your many daily adventures. Full-grain leather uppers breathe well and offer a sophisticated look that fits in at the office or on casual outings. Pigskin linings have Aegis(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial treatment to help deter odor development. Microfiber-wrapped Remember Me(R) foam footbeds take on the shape of your feet for supreme comfort. Grippy outsoles offer solid traction when you need it. Closeout.
short_description: Dive into your daily life in the Merrell Luxe Slide Sandals. They blend comfort and style to keep your feet happy on your many daily adventures.
